item.title: Installing Apache Superset Version 2 on Ubuntu Without Errors
item.description: Apache Superset is a great free and open-source software released by the Apache foundation for advanced data visualization and exploration. Unlike proprietary tools for data visualization, Apache Superset adds value for an organization as free and open-source software.
